forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. Northeast wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 51. North northeast wind 2 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon in Downtown San Francisco unfolds under a sky stripped of any clouds, revealing a vibrant blue expanse that stretches toward the horizon. As temperatures hover comfortably around the mid-60s, the strengthening northeast wind sways the branches of the city's iconic palm trees. This brisk air adds a refreshing edge to the otherwise warm sun, creating a delightful contrast as the day transitions. The Golden Gate Bridge stands proudly in the distance, unencumbered by fog—its grandeur illuminated by the crystalline light of this clear day.

As twilight approaches, the forecast predicts clear skies to envelop the city, inviting an inviting chill, with temperatures dipping to a cozy 51 degrees. The evening promises a gentle north-northeast breeze, which adds a hint of crispness to the air, perfect for leisurely strolls along the waterfront or cozying up with a book at a favorite café. In this delightful weather, layers are advisable; a light jacket or sweater accompanied by comfortable shoes will ensure you're ready for any spontaneous adventure. Whether one chooses to explore the city's vibrant districts or simply reflect in a quiet nook, today offers a canvas painted with warmth and clarity, encouraging all to savor the beauty of a quintessential San Francisco day.
